How to start Housekeeper:

Windows:
1. Use the Windows Explorer to navigate to the directory where you have decompressed Housekeeper.
2. Double-click on "housekeeper.jar" to start the application. If this doesn't work, double-click on "housekeeper.bat"
3. To create a shortcut use "housekeeper.bat" as target and "housekeeper_icon64.ico" as icon.

Linux/Mac OS X/Unix

1. Using you favourite file manager, navigate to the directory where you have decompressed Housekeeper.
2. Execute "housekeeper.jar" to start the application. If this doesn't work, execute on "housekeeper.sh".
3. To create a shortcut use "housekeeper.sh" as target and "housekeeper_icon64.xpm" as icon.
